messages.content: With a General Election on December 12th you will soon have your Postal Vote. I am asking for your support to keep working for the people who live in Newport West.

I was born and brought up in Newport, it’s where my husband and I have raised our family and the place we still call home. I am so proud of our diverse City, and I’m even more proud to have been your local and passionate voice in Parliament.

This election is a choice between those fixated on Brexit and those who can see past it, who realise the country’s priority should be better schools, hospitals and an economy that works for you. A Labour Government in Westminster will deliver change for those overlooked, under-supported and over-stretched.
In Newport West it is a straight race between Labour and the Tories. A vote for any party other than Labour is a vote for them.
I hope you will choose to support me. I won’t let you down.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We won’t let the Tories sell off our NHS.
We’ll introduce a £10 minimum wage for everyone.
Continue the fight to scrap Universal Credit.
Work with WASPI women to get the fair pension deal they deserve.
Fight to save free TV Licences for over 75s.
